meanings.definition: Covered in or containing small stones or pebbles.
meanings.sent1: The path became pebblier as we neared the riverbank.
meanings.sent2: Her shoes crunched on the pebblier ground as she walked.
meanings.sent3: The pebblier driveway made it tricky for the skateboarder to maintain balance.
meanings.sent4: The pebblier surface of the cake gave it a unique texture.
meanings.sent5: The pebblier beach sparkled in the sunlight, inviting us to explore.

meanings.definition: Having a rough or bumpy texture similar to pebbles.
meanings.sent1: The old wall felt pebblier to the touch than the smooth new one.
meanings.sent2: The fabric of the couch was pebblier than expected, but still comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The pebblier road made the bike ride a bit more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a pebblier quality after she caught a cold.
meanings.sent5: The pebblier skin of the fruit indicated it was ripe and ready to eat.
